title: Preparation
text:
Shopping List
Butcher:

2kg Lamb Shoulder (bone-in cut into chunks)

Supermarket:

4kg Potatoes
1 bag (1-2kg) Carrot
Roast veggies
Cherry Tomatoes
4 leaf salad
1-2 slabs of Turkish bread
Garlic & Onion infused oil
1L Chicken Stock
Tomato paste (~3 tbsp)
Sasame dressing (?)
Walnuts (optional)

Herbs:

Cumin
Fennel
Thyme
Bay leaf
Parsley
Rosemary (fresh?)

Assuming there is already:

Corn starch
Olive oil
Neutral oil
Salt & Pepper

title: Preparation
text:
Recipe Ingredients

Turkish Bread

1-2 slabs of turkish bread
Olive oil
Herbs (what should we use?)



Mashed potato

Need to find a lactose free option?



Roasted potato

Potato
Neutral oil
Baking soda
A nicer salt?
Parsley/whatever herbs goes with chips



Green salad

Large bag of 4 leaf salad
Cherry tomato
Walnuts
Sesame dressing



Roasted veggies

Assortment of: Carrot, Mushroom, Zucchini, Sweet potato, pumpkin, eggplant
Herbs: Thyme, Sage (skippable), Parsley



Lamb shoulder

Lamb shoulder (probably butcher)
Garlic & Onion infused oil
Chicken Stock
Tomato paste
Carrot
Potato
Corn starch
Herbs: Cumin, Fennel, Rosemary, Thyme, Bay leaves

title: The Menu for 2025-01-04
text:
Figure 1: Your expectations of this meal.


Disclaimer: Items on the menu are subject to change.

The Carbs
Turkish bread with olive oil & herbs
Creamy mashed potato
Crispy baked potato


The Greens
Leafy salad with cherry tomato, walnuts & sesame dressing
Baked vegetables


The Protein
Lamb shoulder pot roast


The Wagyu

Hida A5 Sirloin 600g 飛騨牛サーロイン
Kobe A5 Scotch Fillet 300g 神戸牛スコッチフィレ
Furano A5 Sirloin 300g 富良野牛サーロイン
Furano A5 Scotch Fillet 300g　富良野スコッチフィレ
Mayura MBS9+ Sirloin 300g
Assorted eye fillet








The Dessert
Tiramisu


The Drinks
Dassai 23 Junmai Daijingo 獺祭２３純米大吟醸　(approx. 50% remaining)
Bon Tsuya Junmai Daijingo 梵艶純米大吟醸
Other drinks (probably)

DassaiBon
